scripts.build: pnpm clean && mkdir -p build/dist && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --outfile=build/dist/gitgov.mjs --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external:react-devtools-core --external:commander --external:ink --external:react --external:assert --external:events --external:util --external:path --external:fs --external:crypto --external:child_process --external:clipboardy --external:@gitgov/core && chmod +x build/dist/gitgov.mjs
scripts.test:all: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm pack:build
